title: Article 2 - Cigarette Marketing Standards
content:
Article 2 - Cigarette Marketing Standards

State Regulations

Part 80 - Introduction And Definitions (§ 80.1 to 80.2)

Part 81 - Registration Of Chain Stores (§ 81.1 to 81.2)

Part 82 - Unlawful Acts (§ 82.1 to 82.5)

Part 83 - Prima Facie Evidence Of Intent (§ 83.1)

Part 84 - Rebates And Concessions (§ 84.1)

Part 85 - Remedies (§ 85.1 to 85.4)

Part 86 - Determination Of Cost (§ 86.1 to 86.4)

Part 87 - Exceptions (§ 87.1 to 87.2)

Part 88 - Miscellaneous Provisions (§ 88.1 to 88.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
